review: I really love the fire TV stick for streaming.  We don't watch a lot of tv, but this is a very convenient way for us to stream the movies we own.  I also use the Prime yoga videos quite a lot, and the kids have really enjoyed watching some of the Prime kids' shows.  A couple of times there's been a little skipping, very infrequently, but I assume that is a connection issue and not due to the processing power in the stick.  I keep losing the remote (by "I" I mean, everyone else in my family), but I set up the app on my phone and that works fine too.  I'm very happy with everything I've done with the tv stick.  I particularly like that it doesn't take any time to boot up or whatnot ... I used to not want to stream on our tv because it takes so long for the Wii or whatever else we were using to stream to start up, etc.
author: Sarah Carpenter
